name: LISHI 1
description:
LISHI-1 VideoGame Cinematic Interactive 3D Adventure

Webpage: OFFICIAL WEBPAGE

Greetings, Im Javier Bonilla the developer of the game LISHI-1, is a small cinematic short film in 3D, developed with UNITY 3D.

Where tells the story of the character named DAMIA IM, where she has to save herself and humanity, from an event of interstellar magnitude; Where beings called SPACE ARCHES, gather several samples of living beings with an advanced intelligence throughout the universe, in order to be analyzed by the creators of the universe and to start a new cycle the universe based on the results that throw the analysis of the samples taken by the SPACE ARCHES. Here DAMIA IM comes into play, which thanks to their abilities, she will prevent the human race from becoming extinct.
